legend_0018_head_teacher_02:
Please do try to keep your voice down if you’re
making calls within the school, won’t you?[VAR 0114(000A)]
legend_0018_head_teacher_03:
You don’t want anyone else overhearing any
personal information, after all.[VAR 0114(000A)]
legend_0018_head_teacher_04:
Honestly... There are so many things we need to
be careful about in this day and age.[VAR 0114(000A)]
legend_0018_head_teacher_05: On you go, then, young [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0403)]manlady.[VAR 0114(000A)]
